text:
Attended a course there by Sam via virtual classes.
I must say he is one of the best adults trainer I came across. Coming from a non IT background I expected a very challenging experience, but Samâ€™s lecturing style and pace made the course very enjoyable. His dedication and sensitivity for participants to learn bridged this gap. His vast knowledge and experience allow us to relate theories back to our workplace scenarios. He took great patient to explain and simplify things for us.
At the same time guiding other advanced learners making sure every one learns well.
It is a great pleasure to be in his class, super friendly and motivating and he inspired me to continue this journey on data science.
Remote location ... need to walk abt 10 mins to a cafe for lunch

It is specialized department of National University of Singapore, which gives really good industry oriented courses. I am NUS-ISS graduate, I secured my dream job.
Join it if you have potential to work hard and achieve your dream. If you just want to relax, this is not for you.
Thanks NUS-ISS for providing me direction and desired skills.
Nice place for courses, I enjoy the atmosphere and facilities here. Just a little troublesome to come into campus due to how large NUS is, but parking is reasonable.
I enjoyed Singapore, NUS is advance teaching/training.
